m.marble-sense: שׁמר:002004001005:See>002003003017:Safe:to watch over;to guard;to be in charge of;to take care of;to protect;to tend;to keep
כסף:002004002001001:Wish:to desire;to long for;to be eager
קדם:002002001013:Space:to approach;to come before;to stand before;to confront
שׂבע:002001001024:Ingest>002003003009:Engage:to be satisfied (with something);to have one's fill (of something)
